Jerk Shrimp Pasta

Jerk Shrimp Pasta

Ingredients

  1. Jerk Paste (Hot)
  2. Sauce Base
    • Red/Green Peppers
    • Garlic
    • Green Onions
    • Thyme
    • Black Pepper + Salt
    • Old Bay Seasoning (Optional)
  3. 10% Cream
  4. Shredded Cheese
  5. Pasta (Penne)

Instructions

  1. Mix the shrimp with the jerk seasoning and cook on a pan (2 min./side)
  2. In another pan, cook the Sauce Base ingredients
  3. Add the cream + jerk paste to the Sauce Base once it is sauteed
  4. Add the pasta + shredded cheese + shrimp to finish
